metadata.description: Comprehensive Claude Code marketplace with specialised bundles for productivity, development, analytics, documents, e-commerce, and AI integrations - featuring consolidated GTM, GA4, and Shopify skills

plugins.name: productivity
plugins.description: Workflow orchestration suite: 4 commands for planning, parallel task execution, and session priming + Google Apps Script skill for Workspace automation

plugins.name: developer
plugins.description: Complete development suite: 3 expert agents (fullstack developer, validation gates, documentation manager) + 3 commands (containerize, PRP generation/execution) + 5 skills (git commit helper, webapp testing, devtools, PRP generator, Fifteen-Factor App) + 7 MCP integrations (Chrome DevTools, Playwright, Cloudflare docs, Microsoft docs, Firecrawl, Context7, Serena AI)

plugins.name: documents
plugins.description: Professional document processing suite: 3 comprehensive skills for Word (.docx), Excel (.xlsx), and PDF files - create, edit, analyse, and process documents with advanced features like tracked changes, forms, tables, OCR, and formulas

plugins.name: claudecode
plugins.description: Claude Code power tools: 4 thinking/reasoning commands (ultra-think, infinite, reflection, prompt writer) + skill-creator guide for building effective skills and extending Claude's capabilities

plugins.name: utilities
plugins.description: General utility tools: timezone conversion and time queries across IANA timezones

plugins.name: finance
plugins.description: Financial market data integrations: 3 MCP servers providing real-time stock market data (AlphaVantage), cryptocurrency data (CoinGecko), and currency conversion rates

plugins.name: ai
plugins.description: AI integration bundle: 2 MCP servers connecting to Gemini AI and Perplexity for enhanced AI capabilities and search

plugins.name: marketing
plugins.description: Complete marketing analytics suite: comprehensive GTM skill (9 reference guides for tags, triggers, variables, data layer, debugging, custom templates, API), comprehensive GA4 skill (15 reference guides for setup, events, ecommerce, BigQuery, Measurement Protocol, privacy compliance), and Google Ads Scripts skill for campaign automation. Includes MCP integrations for Analytics and GTM APIs.

plugins.name: shopify-developer
plugins.description: Professional Shopify development suite with 6 specialised skills covering Liquid templating, theme development, API integration (GraphQL/REST), custom app development, performance optimisation, and debugging. Complete solution for building custom themes, headless storefronts, and Shopify apps.

plugins.name: mcp-fetch
plugins.description: Web content fetching and HTTP requests

plugins.name: mcp-mikrotik
plugins.description: MikroTik router management and network automation

plugins.name: mcp-open-meteo
plugins.description: Weather and climate data (no API key required)
